title: Suh Sung-in
text:
Suh Sung-in (<a href="Hangul">Hangul</a>: 서성인; born July 18, 1959 in <a href="Seoul">Seoul</a>, <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>) is a former <a href="boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>.
Pro career.
In 1984, Suh became the <a href="International%20Boxing%20Federation">IBF</a> <a href="Super%20Bantamweight">Super Bantamweight</a> champion by beating Bobby Berna via a tenth-round TKO. He defended his title once before losing it to <a href="Kim%20Ji-won%20%28boxer%29">Kim Ji-won</a> by a tenth-round KO in 1985.
